notes.text:
A wise man said 
If you cant beat the cancer then play the cancer:D
Took me pretty long to reach kog this month 
I tried different versions of archfiends and aliens but after loosing rank from legend 3 to legend 1 i decided to play flying fish 

Possible changes:
Econ take can win games and with powerfull rebirth its even Stronger but its useless against whale so if you play against many ssa super rush is the better Choice 

Torpedo is the perfect counter against econ take but can be replaced with 2nd wall of d

Lost most of the times if i didnt draw flying fish so maybe Restart works but i used mystic depths for more power
